name: Casbre Tleak [beta 0.73]
description:
This is breakout/arkanoid based game, where you control a mighty robot and help your army to conquer black evil castles. Enemy will shoot bombs to kill your guys. Your robot is armored enough to kick bombs, but also it armed with rocket launcher, laser and autogun, AND can build blocks to protect your men. What a wonderful piece of technology!

Task:

Deal damage to enemy castle enough to destroy all 10 towers. Repeat to the next castle. Do not let your enemy to kill all your army!

Controls:

  • Mouse to move your robot.
  • Mouse wheel up to scroll weapons and left button to fire.
  • Mouse wheel down to scroll blocks and right button to build it.

More things to say:

  • This is my first GameMakerStudio experience, so don't expect too much, I'm just training ;)
  • Keep in mind, that you will inherit blocks from your last defeated enemy, so save some of them for yourself.
  • Every enemy block and tower destroyed gives you a few score points, every 10 points spawn a random bonus: attack, building or extra guys to your army.
  • You can always see your attack and building points (AP and BP) on the back of your robot.
  • Laser burst costs 9 AP and releases 3 beams which penetrates and damages all except mirrors (be very careful with them!).
  • Autogun shoots 4 times and costs 4 AP.
  • Rocket is 20 AP and fly over all obstacles to make a boom where you pointed to.
  • Stone wood and mirror blocks are 10, 5 and 2 BP.
